detail_desc: Loose-fitting T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits at the hem.
Two-button blazer in cotton seersucker with fake flap welt pockets at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent.
Sports jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and a contrasting colour panel down the outside of the sleeves. Side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs with contrasting colour panels down the sides and ribbed hems.
Top in slub cotton jersey with appliqués on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in slub cotton jersey with appliqués on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Capri trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slits at the hems.
Capri trousers in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slits at the hems.

Imitation suede sandals with a wraparound ankle strap that is elasticated at the back and covered wedge heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.

Trousers in soft twill made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently tapered legs with a tab and button. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a high waist, visible button fly and skinny legs.

Tulle skirt with a glittery elasticated waistband. Jersey lining.
3/4-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with a short slit at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit.

Bandeau bikini top with a silicone trim at the top and lined cups with removable inserts and side support. Detachable ties at the back of the neck and wide ties at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Jacquard-weave top in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend. V-neck with gathered seams at the front and narrow ties at the back of the neck, and a concealed zip in the side. Dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats and elasticated cuffs.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Jacquard-weave top in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend. V-neck with gathered seams at the front and narrow ties at the back of the neck, and a concealed zip in the side. Dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats and elasticated cuffs.

Trousers in a lightweight weave with a high, elasticated waist, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.

Padded all-in-one suit in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front that continues part-way down one leg, a zipped chest pocket and elastication at the back, cuffs and hems. Reinforced at the knees and back, reinforced elastic straps at the hems and reflective details. Fleece lining. The all-in-one suit has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft matt finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, chin guard and a zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the back of the waist and ribbing containing glittery threads at the cuffs. Lined.
